translation.en: -[JT] Howdy, miss. -[Chad] How's it going?
[JT] Can we get you to sign our petition?
Hey, you've got a great smile, sir.
Would you sign our petition to stop talking shit on e-scooters?
translation.es: ¿Quiere firmar contra críticas a los scooters eléctricos?

translation.en: To stop talking e-shit on scooters?
Just regular shit on e-scooters.
-Sure. -Thanks.
What's e-shit?
Yeah, we're pretty prominent scooter riders,
and we've been facing some pretty heavy verbal abuse
translation.es: y nos insultan bastante y con saña cuando estamos en la calle.

translation.en: every time we've been riding. Someone called me a straight-up bitch.
translation.es: y nos insultan bastante y con saña cuando estamos en la calle. Una vez, me llamaron "perra".

translation.en: That's fucked up, bro.
I mean, I don't like them.
translation.es: O sea, a mí no me gustan.

translation.en: People who ride them tend to be fucking stupid and dangerous on them.
translation.es: Quienes los usan suelen ser estúpidos y peligrosos.

translation.en: I don't know, dude. Most riders I know are chill.
translation.es: No sé, los que conozco son tranquilos.

translation.en: It's not about chill. It's about being stupid on the strand.
translation.es: Eso no importa, pero hacen estupideces en la costa.

translation.en: Well, I see them as kind of scary because they come riding past you so fast
translation.es: A mí me dan miedo porque me pasan al lado muy rápido.

translation.en: when you're just walking along.
-Yeah. -Right.
If you sign that, you can't say things like that anymore.
translation.es: Si firma eso, ya no podrá decir esas cosas.

translation.en: Oh, okay. [chuckles]
Thanks. Now for the rest of your life,
translation.es: Por el resto de su vida,

translation.en: you can never utter another bad word about e-scooters or those who ride them.
translation.es: no puede criticar los scooters eléctricos ni a los conductores.

translation.en: Okay.
-Do you want my email? -Yes, please.
I'm all about ripping, but not at the cost
translation.es: Me gusta la velocidad, pero no si perjudica

translation.en: of some fucking kid on his bike or some lady walking her dog.
translation.es: a un niño en bicicleta o a una señora que pasea el perro.

translation.en: If we could get you on a scooter right now, would you be down to try?
translation.es: Si te subiéramos a un scooter ahora, ¿lo probarías?

translation.en: -Possibly. -Dude, let's do it.
-[JT] Go, baby! -[Chad] Let's do it!
[JT] Learn to love it!
He looks stoked. Dude, he looks good. Look at him go!
-[Chad] Dude, he's touching some crete. -[JT] One-footer!
translation.es: - Maneja con un solo pie. - ¡Con un pie!

translation.en: -Let's go-- -Not gonna lie, feels good.
translation.es: No voy a mentir, es agradable.

translation.en: -Yeah, dude! Did you like it? -You loved it.
[Strider] You could say Chad and JT are…
translation.es: Podría decirse que Chad y JT son…

translation.en: They're activists. What does that mean? They're spreading stoke.
These guys are built to create change.
translation.es: Están destinados a generar un cambio.

translation.en: [man] You can tell they're great guys. I just met them
translation.es: Se nota que son geniales. Acabo de conocerlos

translation.en: and walked up and asked for a selfie. You know, nice as can be,
translation.es: y les pedimos una selfi. Son muy amables.

translation.en: and I love their energy.
-Hey, move over here! -[Chad] Hey, guys.
You should post up and watch our dance. It'll be sick.
-It's for a charitable cause. -Wanna watch our dance to save the coral?
translation.es: Es por una causa benéfica. Bailamos para salvar los corales.

translation.en: JT and Chad's activism, I describe it as things that actually are really good
translation.es: El activismo de JT y Chad es por causas muy buenas para la humanidad,

translation.en: for humanity, like saving the coral reef as well as
translation.es: El activismo de JT y Chad es por causas muy buenas para la humanidad, como salvar el arrecife de coral y también organizar fiestas.

translation.en: parties.
translation.es: como salvar el arrecife de coral y también organizar fiestas.

translation.en: Why not? We need to have more fun in life.
Most of what Chad and JT do is completely moronic,
translation.es: La mayor parte de lo que hacen Chad y JT es totalmente estúpido.

translation.en: but they're trying really hard. It's admirable how hard they're trying.
translation.es: Pero se esfuerzan mucho. Es admirable lo mucho que se esfuerzan.

translation.en: [Chad] Thank you! [cheers] Thank you!
You guys are inspiring me and a lot of people.
translation.es: Me inspiran a mí y a mucha gente.

translation.en: -[JT] Hell yeah. -Thank you.
[JT] Thank you for saying that. It's really nice.
Chad's probably the hottest in our squad. His hair is beautiful.
translation.es: Chad es el más sexi del grupo. Su cabello es hermoso.

translation.en: He's the best surfer out of the group.
translation.es: Es el mejor surfista de todos.

translation.en: JT is probably the smartest dude I've ever met.
translation.es: JT es el tipo más inteligente que conozco.

translation.en: I've never seen anyone excel at vacation activities like JT does.
translation.es: Se destaca más que nadie en actividades recreativas.

translation.en: They're two of the best bros and will have your back, no matter what.
translation.es: Son dos amigos excelentes que siempre te apoyan.

translation.en: I first heard about Chad and JT
when I saw their video of them at the city council
translation.es: cuando los vi luchar en el ayuntamiento

translation.en: fighting against parties being banned in the Hollywood Hills.
translation.es: contra la prohibición de fiestas en Hollywood Hills.

translation.en: Last week I heard the gut-wrenching news
you've passed a bill banning house parties.
translation.es: de que aprobaron una ley que prohíbe las fiestas.

translation.en: I won't lie to you, Council. I'm not stoked.
[reporter] What makes it a party ban, rather than a party restriction?
translation.es: ¿Por qué es una prohibición y no una restricción?

translation.en: [JT] I think that's pure semantics. The reality is,
translation.es: Eso es solo semántica. Intentan robarle la diversión a esta gente maravillosa.

translation.en: they're trying to steal the fun from these wonderful people.
translation.es: Intentan robarle la diversión a esta gente maravillosa.

translation.en: I'm not surprised they became so famous. It feels like everybody can connect with them.
translation.es: No me sorprende que se hicieran famosos. Todos se identifican con ellos.

translation.en: They fight for the things that will bring more stoke to the community.
translation.es: Luchan por cosas que traen entusiasmo a la comunidad.

translation.en: It's gotta be the chillest, most down-to-earth bros on the planet.
translation.es: Son los tipos más tranquilos y humildes del planeta.

translation.en: I don't know who Chad and JT are.
translation.es: No sé quiénes son Chad y JT.

translation.en: They were running, gunning, and drilling it.
[Chad] Bring e-scooters to the Olympics!
[Strider] Straight up raising awareness everywhere they went. It was epic, dude.
translation.es: Concientizaban en todos lados. Fue espectacular.

translation.en: They were on top of the world. And then,
translation.es: Estaban en su mejor momento hasta el asunto de acabar con las espaldas mojadas.

translation.en: they try, uh, to do this thing to save the boarders.
translation.es: hasta el asunto de acabar con las espaldas mojadas.

translation.en: And that was basically a U-turn for them.
translation.es: Fue un giro radical para ellos.

translation.en: What's up, dudes?
We're here today to fight for a cause that's near and dear to our hearts,
translation.es: Queremos luchar por una causa que nos toca de cerca:

translation.en: the safety and freedom of skateboarders.
translation.es: camisetas de poliéster para los skaters.

translation.en: For far too long in society, skateboarders have been oppressed.
translation.es: Sudan y se les moja la espalda. Es peligroso.

translation.en: It's still illegal in parts of southern California,
translation.es: Hace calor en el sur de California.

translation.en: with cops handing out tickets and security guards being aggro.
translation.es: Deberían recibir camisetas de secado rápido.

translation.en: That's why we'll set up a booth in Huntington Beach to fight for the cause.
translation.es: Instalaremos un puesto en la playa para luchar por la causa.

translation.en: Come out, support us, and let's go!
-[Chad] Hey, dude. -[JT] Hey, what's up, sir?
-[Chad] You down to protect our boarders? -[JT] Do you want to protect our boarders?
I do, but I'm in a hurry.
Do you guys wanna protect our boarders? [man] Yeah, I do. I…
translation.es: - ¿Está en contra de las espaldas mojadas? - Sí. Me interesa.

translation.en: -[JT] Can we get you to sign our petition? -I can do that.
Yeah, it's a huge issue.
[man] Yeah, I'm all about closing them.
translation.es: Estoy a favor de cerrar las fronteras.

translation.en: We want a system where there's, like, no citations,
translation.es: Queremos que no haya espaldas mojadas,

translation.en: no people getting booted. It's fully legal and secure for the boarders.
translation.es: que todos puedan andar por ahí sin preocuparse por eso.

translation.en: Really, the bottom line with borders is, it's just like your house.
translation.es: El tema de las fronteras es igual que lo que pasa en tu casa.

translation.en: You'd rather people come in through the front door than jump over the fence.
translation.es: Hay que entrar por la puerta, no saltando la cerca. Claro.

translation.en: If we had an immigration system where we started letting people in,
translation.es: Si tuviéramos un sistema de inmigración para que la gente entrara

translation.en: you know, do it legally.
-What? -[man] Yes.
-Whatever. -Yeah.
-What was he talking about? -I don't know, dude.
-I'm stoked he's fired up by the cause. -Yeah, dude, we got that signature.
translation.es: - Me entusiasma que le interese la causa. - Sí, firmó.

translation.en: I'm from up north. I'm from Massachusetts.
We're so far from the border. It's only something you hear on the news.
translation.es: Veo este tema en las noticias, no lo vivimos día a día.

translation.en: So there are no boarders in Massachusetts?
-[JT] Whoa. That's crazy. -[Chad] Whoa.
-The city doesn't allow it? -What do you mean?
If you try to skate in Massachusetts, they kick you out?
translation.es: Si intentas patinar en Massachusetts, ¿te echan?

translation.en: When I was 18, I was in Tijuana every weekend.
translation.es: A los 18 años, iba a Tijuana todos los fines de semana.

translation.en: -Nice. -That place is… disgusting, you know?
They were treating people wrong. Even Mexican children.
translation.es: Tratan mal a la gente. Hasta los niños mexicanos.

translation.en: They were treating people wrong. I didn't like that.
translation.es: Los tratan mal. No me gustó.

translation.en: They were skating where they weren't supposed to?
I guess so. If you wanna put it that way.
translation.es: Supongo que sí. Si quieres decirlo así.

translation.en: -Oh, okay. -Right.
We all skated where we weren't supposed to at some point.
translation.es: Todos patinamos con la espalda mojada alguna vez.

translation.en: If you work and pay taxes to support everything--
translation.es: Si trabajas y pagas impuestos para mantener todo…

translation.en: I don't know what we're talking about.
-[Chad] It was-- -Keeping borders safe.
Right. We're on the same page then. Sweet.
-[JT] My dude! You believe in the cause! -[Chad] Dude!
-Protect our boarders, baby! -Let's go!
-[JT] What a legend! -Had me making a U-turn.
translation.es: - ¡Qué leyenda! - Me hizo girar en U.

translation.en: Haven't seen anyone in gear.
Why do you believe in protecting our boarders?
There's a lot of shitbags over there that don't need to be over here.
translation.es: Hay muchos mierdas que no deberían estar.

translation.en: They come at you, sideways and cross-eyed like they wanna start a gang thing on you.
translation.es: Se te acercan, bizcos y caminando raro, como si quisieran meterse contigo.

translation.en: We've seen that. You can be shredding, and they'll roll up on you like,
translation.es: Lo hemos visto. Estás haciendo trucos en el skate y te dicen:

translation.en: "Get out of here." You're like, "What's with the attitude?"
translation.es: "Lárgate de aquí". Y dices: "¿Qué te pasa?".

translation.en: Can we get a selfie with you?
-Sure. -Hell yeah.
Let me--
-My board. -All right. Here we go.
-Dude, so-- -Get in here, dog.
-Got it, dude. -My nickname's Iggy.
[Chad] Iggy, what up? So stoked you wanna protect the boarders.
translation.es: Iggy, me entusiasma que estés a favor.

translation.en: I do. They bring them to our country.
translation.es: Sí. Los traen a nuestro país.

translation.en: We give them everything in medical business. Everything!
Twenty-two percent loans and shit, you know on interest rates and shit.
translation.es: Préstamos al 22 %. Ya saben, lo de la tasa de interés.

translation.en: They get 0% interest rates.
-Whoa. Thanks, man. -Catch you here later.
What a diverse range of views on skateboarders.
translation.es: Cuántas opiniones sobre las espaldas mojadas.

translation.en: For sure.
[Strider] Chad and JT posted that image with the wrong spelling of boarders.
translation.es: Chad y JT publicaron la imagen con ese mensaje racista.

translation.en: I don't think they knew anything what they were talking about with that.
translation.es: Creo que no entendían nada de lo que habían hablado.

translation.en: But life continued as usual for them, at least for a bit.
translation.es: Su vida siguió como siempre para ellos por un tiempo.

translation.en: Uh, what up, Council? My name's Chad Kroeger.
translation.es: ¿Qué tal, Concejo? Me llamo Chad Kroeger.

translation.en: I'm here to promote an amazing, new, holistic practice.
translation.es: Vengo a promover una práctica holística increíble.

translation.en: It's something I accidentally discovered at my first Weenie Roast.
translation.es: La descubrí por accidente en mi primer Weenie Roast.

translation.en: During The Lumineers' set, I passed out face down, nude,
translation.es: Cuando tocaban The Lumineers, me desmayé desnudo, boca abajo

translation.en: and spread-eagle in the sun.
And soon thereafter, security woke me up.
translation.es: Poco después, un guardia me despertó.

translation.en: And I was surprised at how lucid I was.
translation.es: Me sorprendió lo lúcido que estaba.

translation.en: I was expecting to be sloshed.
Here's the thing. I wasn't.
translation.es: Esta es la cuestión: no fue así.

translation.en: I didn't realize where this mysterious boost came from
translation.es: No me di cuenta del origen de este misterio,

translation.en: until my health guru Troy, from Venice,
translation.es: hasta que mi gurú, Troy, de Venice,

translation.en: showed me something called perineum sunning.
translation.es: me habló sobre asolear el perineo.

translation.en: Perineum sunning is where you allow direct sunlight
translation.es: Asolear el perineo es dejar que la luz solar

translation.en: to penetrate your bare sphincter for 30 seconds or more.
translation.es: haga contacto directo con el esfínter durante 30 segundos o más.

translation.en: -Dr. Drew says that the sun is a massive-- -[man] Mayor. Mayor. Mayor.
translation.es: - El Dr. Drew dice que el sol es una gran… - Alcalde.

translation.en: The public speaker is allowed to speak about something
translation.es: El orador puede hablar sobre temas

translation.en: that's within the jurisdiction of the City of Irvine,
translation.es: dentro de la jurisdicción de Irvine.

translation.en: but this subject matter is not.
This is a holistic practice that'll radically change everyone's lives.
translation.es: Esta es una práctica holística que cambiará totalmente la vida de todos.

translation.en: Point of order.
Please allow my colleague to expand, and thank you.
translation.es: Permita que continúe mi colega. Gracias.

translation.en: [JT] What up, Council?
The most difficult thing about perineum sunning
translation.es: Lo más difícil de asolear el perineo

translation.en: is there's no space where we're allowed to practice it.
translation.es: es que no hay espacio para practicarlo.

translation.en: We can't at my mom's house because it weirds out her boyfriend Greg,
translation.es: No podemos en la casa de mi mamá, porque incomoda a su novio Greg,

translation.en: who is a legend.
And we're not allowed to do it at the parks,
so to your interjection that this isn't within the city's jurisdiction,
translation.es: Tampoco podemos hacerlo en parques. En respuesta a que no es jurisdicción de la ciudad,

translation.en: we will ask that the city create a space for this health practice.
translation.es: le pedimos un espacio a la ciudad para realizar esta saludable práctica.

translation.en: If it's cool with you, Council,
I'd love to have my friend and colleague, Chad Kroeger,
translation.es: quisiera que mi amigo y colega Chad Kroeger

translation.en: demonstrate the position for perineum sunning.
translation.es: mostrara la posición para asolear el perineo.

translation.en: If you can redirect your attention towards the stairs.
Thank you, Chad.
And thank you, Council. We look forward to you guys putting this into action.
translation.es: Y gracias, Consejo. Esperamos que lo ponga en práctica.

translation.en: -[Chad] Is this it? -[JT] I think so.
The gate's ajar.
No, dude. It's a gate.
Dude, I wonder what big news Zedd has to tell us.
translation.es: Me pregunto qué noticias tendrá Zedd.

translation.en: [JT] Maybe he just wants to show us his new place.
translation.es: Quizá solo quiere mostrarnos su nueva casa.

translation.en: Whoa.
-[Chad] It's huge. -[JT] Big-ass door.
[Zedd] Coming.
[JT] What's up, dude?
-My dog. -Bring it in.
-Who's first? -[Chad] JT, you go first.
-How are you? -[Chad] What's up?
[Zedd] Welcome to the new crib.
-[Chad] Dude! -[JT] Dude!
[Zedd] Where do we even start?
-Uh, bathroom. -[Chad] Dude, nice.
-Giant tree. -[JT] Have you climbed that yet?
-[Zedd] Not yet. -[Chad] Dude, are these succulents?
Yeah.
-There is fish in there. -[JT] Do you have a shark?
There is a light in there, but I have no idea how to use it.
translation.es: Hay una luz ahí, pero no sé cómo usarla.

translation.en: -So many spots to party. All ideal. -Yes, absolutely.
translation.es: - Hay muchos lugares ideales para fiestas. - Sí, por supuesto.

translation.en: Speaking of party, by the way.
I don't know what your plans are, but…
translation.es: No sé cuáles son sus planes,

translation.en: I'd love to have you guys in Vegas with me.
translation.es: pero quisiera que me acompañaran a Las Vegas.

translation.en: If you guys would be down to give a speech on stage
translation.es: Si están dispuestos a hablar en el escenario

translation.en: about your activism. I have a residency there.
translation.es: sobre su activismo, ahí soy DJ residente.

translation.en: -For real? -[Zedd] If you guys are down.
-Yeah, we're down. -Yeah.
-Yeah? -[both] Yeah.
-Dude. -Thank you.
[Zedd] We have to spread the love.
-Yeah. -[Zedd] My dog.
The Vegas show is about 3,500 people-ish.
translation.es: En el show de Las Vegas, habrá unas 3500 personas.

translation.en: I'm envisioning playing a song, slowing it down,
translation.es: Pienso poner un tema, hacer que suene más lento,

translation.en: volume off, and I invite them on stage, and they jump up on the booth.
translation.es: bajar el volumen, invitarlos al escenario, que suban a la cabina

translation.en: And they just give us a speech, you know, raise awareness.
translation.es: y den un discurso para concientizar.

translation.en: I mean, your activism is… I live for it.
I've always lived for it. That's how we met.
translation.es: Siempre fue así. Así nos conocimos.

translation.en: [JT] I know.
Vegas is the perfect platform of people from all around the world, coming to one place
translation.es: Las Vegas es la plataforma perfecta, con gente de todo el mundo en un lugar

translation.en: to spread a message that then goes back internationally back home.
translation.es: para difundir el mensaje por todo el planeta.

translation.en: That's the perfect place to do it.
I also want them because they're friends,
and I love being around friends.
translation.es: y me encanta estar con amigos.

translation.en: So, dude, um…
We're gonna do perineum sunning if you're down. [Zedd] What's that?
translation.es: - Vamos a asolear el perineo. - ¿Qué es eso?

translation.en: With your permission, we'd love to do it here.
translation.es: Si nos das permiso, nos encantaría hacerlo aquí.

translation.en: It's where you sun your butthole.
translation.es: Es tomar sol en el ano.

translation.en: It boosts stoke.
I might sit this one out. You can do it if you want to.
-Really? I mean-- -Be my guest.
-This spot would be perfect. -Yeah.
[Chad] Whoa, this is long.
-[Chad] All right. -[JT] You ready?
-[Chad] We're losing light. -[JT] Uno, dos, tres!
I didn't know that that's how that works.
translation.es: No sabía que se hacía así.

translation.en: [JT] Wow, that's great.
I'm so glad this is happening right now.
translation.es: Me alegra que esto esté sucediendo.

translation.en: -[JT] Thanks, Zedd! -[Chad] Thank you, dude!
[Zedd] Oh, this is just beautiful.
When Zedd invited Chad and JT to do a speech in Vegas,
translation.es: Cuando Zedd invitó a Chad y a JT a dar un discurso en Las Vegas,

translation.en: it was huge for them because it was everything they stand for.
translation.es: fue importante, porque era todo lo que representaban.

translation.en: Problem was the borders image was starting to spread.
translation.es: Pero la foto de las espaldas mojadas se viralizó.

translation.en: Their fans didn't take it well, but the guys were so busy spreading stoke,
translation.es: A sus fans no les gustó, pero los chicos estaban ocupados

translation.en: they didn't know a storm was headed their way.
translation.es: no sabían lo que los esperaba.

translation.en: We're out here today to raise more money for the coral reefs.
translation.es: Vinimos a recaudar más dinero para los arrecifes de coral.

translation.en: We've organized a Hollywood bus tour.
We're gonna take some of the most curious cinephiles in LA
translation.es: Les mostraremos a los amantes del cine de L. A.

translation.en: and show them where their favorite movies were made.
translation.es: dónde se filmaron sus películas favoritas.

translation.en: If you're into Hollywood, into movies, cruise!
translation.es: Si les gusta Hollywood y el cine, ¡vengan!

translation.en: All right, and we're off. Everybody, welcome to the Hollywood stoke tour.
translation.es: Muy bien, ya salimos. Bienvenidos al tour de Hollywood.

translation.en: We're about to show you guys some of the most stoke-raising movie locations in Hollywood.
translation.es: Vamos a mostrarles lugares de Hollywood que desbordan entusiasmo.

translation.en: We'll start it off hot. Up here on the right,
translation.es: Empezaremos con todo. A la derecha,

translation.en: David Park's apartment from the fourth Fast and Furious,
translation.es: el apartamento de David Park en Rápidos y furiosos 4.

translation.en: "Fast and Furious."
-Which one? This one? -[Chad] Pretty awesome, right?
This is the big kahuna.
Bob's Food Market. You guys know it better as Toretto's Market.
translation.es: El mercado de alimentos de Bob, el mercado de Toretto.

translation.en: It's in Fast and the Furious 1,
where Brian O'Conner and Mia meet for the first time.
translation.es: donde Brian O'Conner y Mia se conocen.

translation.en: He keeps ordering tuna sandwiches with the crusts cut off, which is a cute detail.
translation.es: Él pide sándwiches de atún sin corteza, un lindo detalle.

translation.en: So was there any old Hollywood movie filmed around here?
translation.es: ¿Se filmó alguna película de Hollywood antigua por aquí?

translation.en: Old Hollywood? The first Fast and Furious is 20 years old.
translation.es: ¿Antigua? El primer Rápidos y furiosos tiene 20 años.

translation.en: -[Chad] Yeah. -If you say so.
[JT] This is big-time.
Dominic Toretto's house.
Hell yeah. You guys fired up? Look at that.
That's probably the most famous house in all of LA.
translation.es: Probablemente sea la casa más famosa de Los Ángeles.

translation.en: Is this all Fast and Furious?
Oh, we can try to mix it up.
-Yeah. -Yeah.
[JT] What are you looking for?
-Uh… -Don't even ask.
Something a little more sort of glamorous, historic.
translation.es: Algo un poco más glamoroso, histórico.

translation.en: -Yeah, like classic-- -Like James Dean.
-[woman 1] The Hollywood-- -Who's James Dean?
Did you just ask who James Dean was?
Oh, dude.
Why are they on their phone?
[Strider] Somehow the "protect our borders" image got picked up by the mainstream media.
translation.es: La imagen de "Fuera, espaldas mojadas" salió en los medios.

translation.en: That's when it blew up.
When you guys hear the phrase "Protect our borders," what does that, uh…
like, make you think of?
Are… are you serious? Like, protect our borders?
What does it mean to you?
We took a photo of someone with "protect our borders" shirts.
translation.es: Tenemos una foto que dice "Fuera, espaldas mojadas".

translation.en: We thought it meant protecting skateboarders,
translation.es: Creímos que era a favor de las camisetas de poliéster.

translation.en: and then we posted it on our IG,
and now we're getting like…
-[woman 1] Backlash? -Yeah.
You're supporting keeping immigrants from crossing over.
translation.es: Es un insulto para los inmigrantes que entran al país.

translation.en: Is immigration, like, a big issue?
-Haven't you seen the news? -My gosh.
You heard about BLM, right? Black lives matter.
-Is that a skate company? -I don't know why we're still trying.
translation.es: - ¿Es una empresa de skates? - Mejor ni lo intentemos.

translation.en: Are you being canceled? Is that what the posts say?
-That's what they're tweeting. -[woman 2] Really?
That's not good.
It means you won't be popular on Instagram anymore.
translation.es: Ya no serán populares en Instagram.

translation.en: This is where Johnny Tran's cousin Lance falls off his dirt bike. Pretty sick.
translation.es: Aquí Lance, el primo de Johnny Tran, se cayó de su moto. Fue terrible.

translation.en: [JT] That's from the first Fast and Furious.
translation.es: Es del primer Rápidos y furiosos.

translation.en: I'm more worried about you not being educated
translation.es: Me preocupa más que no estén al tanto

translation.en: about things that are going on in our country.
translation.es: de las cosas que están pasando en nuestro país.

translation.en: [man] What happened now?
We're sorry. We're probably gonna have to stop for a second so we can call Zedd.
translation.es: Lo sentimos, tenemos que parar un segundo para llamar a Zedd.

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait. Where does the tour end?
-Uh… -Neptune's Net in Malibu.
-We're going to Malibu? -Malibu?
This is Vermont Avenue and Franklin?
You guys hang tight, and we're going to have you back where we said we'd have you at the time we said.
translation.es: Esperen y los llevaremos de regreso donde dijimos, a la hora que dijimos.

translation.en: -[woman 1] That's passed. -That's passed already.
translation.es: - Ya pasó. - Ya pasó la hora.

translation.en: [JT] Okay, well, as close as we can.
[woman 1] There's no way you can be that uneducated.
I think they were high.
-Did you guys see my vape? -No.
All good.
I think I'm actually traumatized.
After a while, I didn't have the energy to talk back to them. They were so stupid.
translation.es: Después de un tiempo, no tuve energía para responderles. Eran tan estúpidos.

translation.en: -[JT] Zedd. It's Chad and JT. -[Chad] Hey, Zedd.
translation.es: - Zedd. Son Chad y JT. - Hola, Zedd.

translation.en: We got your message. And, uh, just give us a call back, dude.
Uh, I think there's a big misunderstanding.
There's a lot of misinformation out there that I think is being, uh… That's misrepresenting me and Chad.
translation.es: Hay mucha información falsa sobre Chad y yo.

translation.en: Just give us a call back and, uh…
-Yeah. -Love… love you.
Hey, we're giving a tour right now.
Guys, you wanna leave a voicemail for Zedd?
[all] No.
All right.
People were mad when they saw that photo.
translation.es: La gente se enojó cuando vio esa foto.

translation.en: The Internet's wacky right now.
Make one mistake like that, and you're done.
translation.es: Si cometes un error así, estás acabado.

translation.en: It's amazing how people can turn against you so fast.
translation.es: Es increíble cómo la gente se vuelve en tu contra tan rápido.

translation.en: Oh, you're done.
[Strider] That night things got worse and worse.
News of the border spread like wildfire.
By the next day, the guys had lost half their freaking fan base.
translation.es: Al otro día, habían perdido a la mitad de sus fans.
